roleset.name: stretch out or over
roleset.note: SPREADEAGLE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense-groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from spreadeagle.01-v)

example.name: Example with arg 0
example.text: They spread-eagled him across the floor.

example.name: example without arg 0
example.text: The Goan was spread-eagled on the ground.

roleset.name: stand with arms and legs stretched out
roleset.note: SPREADEAGLE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense-groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from spreadeagle.02-v)

example.name: Example with location
example.text: A young woman was spread-eagled against the wall.

example.name: non-person spread-eagled
example.text: Pangle stood, arms and legs spread-eagled.
